author: Carol Burnett
content: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

author: Charles R. Swindoll
content: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
content: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

author: Unknown
content: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.

author: Og Mandino
content: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

author: Nelson Mandela
content: It always seems impossible until it's done.

author: Confucius
content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Bo Jackson
content: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
content: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.

author: Og Mandino
content: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
content: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.

author: Walt Disney
content: If you can dream it, you can do it.

author: Robert H. Schuller
content: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.

author: Mark Twain
content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
content: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.

author: H. G. Wells
content: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.

author: George S. Patton
content: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.

author: Gordon B. Hinckley
content: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.

author: Tony Robbins
content: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

author: Aristotle
content: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.

author: Kyle Chandler
content: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.

author: William James
content: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.

author: Dalai Lama
content: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

author: Arthur Ashe
content: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

author: Winston Churchill
content: If you're going through hell, keep going.

author: Sam Levenson
content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

author: Ralph Marston
content: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.

author: Walter Elliot
content: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.

author: W. Clement Stone
content: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.

author: Winston Churchill
content: Never, never, never give up.

author: Maya Angelou
content: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.

author: Jim Rohn
content: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

author: Nikos Kazantzakis
content: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Well done is better than well said.

author: Walt Disney
content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.

author: Julie Andrews
content: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.

author: Les Brown
content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.

author: Thomas Paine
content: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.

author: William Blake
content: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.

author: Muhammad Iqbal
content: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.

author: Philip Sidney
content: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.

author: Hubert H. Humphrey
content: Never give in and never give up.

author: William James
content: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.

author: John F. Kennedy
content: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.

author: Amelia Earhart
content: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.

author: Albert Schweitzer
content: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.

author: Alfred A. Montapert
content: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.

author: John Dewey
content: Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.

author: John W. Gardner
content: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.

author: Bobby Knight
content: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.

author: Jim Rohn
content: If you don't like how things are, change it! You're not a tree.

author: Samuel Beckett
content: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.

author: Helen Rowland
content: You will never win if you never begin.

author: George S. Patton
content: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.

author: Napoleon Hill
content: A goal is a dream with a deadline.

author: Allen Ginsberg
content: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.

author: Carl Sandburg
content: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.

author: Henry Ford
content: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.

author: Michael Korda
content: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.

author: John Burroughs
content: If you think you can do it, you can.

author: Joan of Arc
content: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.

author: Babe Ruth
content: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.

author: Henry Drummond
content: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.

author: Tom Stoppard
content: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.

author: Christopher Morley
content: Big shots are only little shots who keep shooting.

author: Saint Teresa of Avila
content: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.

author: Matthew Henry
content: After a storm comes a calm.

author: Thomas A. Edison
content: There's a way to do it better - find it.

author: Norman Vincent Peale
content: It's always too early to quit.

author: Orison Swett Marden
content: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.

author: Norman Ralph Augustine
content: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.

author: Ted Turner
content: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.

author: Peter Marshall
content: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.

author: Tecumseh
content: From my tribe I take nothing, I am the maker of my own fortune.

author: Sophocles
content: Always desire to learn something useful.

author: Jack London
content: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.

author: Denis Diderot
content: You have to make it happen.

author: Simone Weil
content: I can, therefore I am.

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Never complain and never explain.

author: George C. Marshall
content: Don't fight the problem, decide it.

author: Victor Kiam
content: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.

author: Carl von Clausewitz
content: Pursue one great decisive aim with force and determination.

author: Norman Cousins
content: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: We aim above the mark to hit the mark.

author: Herbert A. Simon
content: One finds limits by pushing them.

author: Richard Rorty
content: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.

author: Golda Meir
content: The dog that trots about finds a bone.

author: William Wordsworth
content: To begin, begin.

author: John Donne
content: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail.

author: Florence Nightingale
content: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.

author: John Burroughs
content: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.

author: Shakti Gawain
content: You create your opportunities by asking for them.

author: Donna Brazile
content: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different.

author: Orison Swett Marden
content: A will finds a way.

author: Lucille Ball
content: The more things you do, the more you can do.

author: Baltasar Gracian
content: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.

author: Persius
content: He conquers who endures.

author: Baruch Spinoza
content: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.

author: Christopher Reeve
content: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
content: Get action. Seize the moment. Man was never intended to become an oyster.

author: Horace
content: Don't think, just do.

author: Octavio Paz
content: Deserve your dream.

author: Aeschylus
content: God always strives together with those who strive.

author: Taika Waititi
content: Music - it's motivational and just makes you relax.

author: Philip Emeagwali
content: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.

author: Benjamin Jowett
content: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.

author: Epictetus
content: Only the educated are free.

author: Stevie Wonder
content: If you don't ask, you don't get.

author: Baltasar Gracian
content: Know or listen to those who know.

author: Jimmy Dean
content: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.

author: Jim Elliot
content: Wherever you are - be all there.

author: Charles Atlas
content: Step by step and the thing is done.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.

author: William Hazlitt
content: The more we do, the more we can do.

author: John Burroughs
content: Leap, and the net will appear.

author: Lauren Bacall
content: I am not a has-been. I am a will be.

author: Robert Henri
content: Do whatever you do intensely.

author: Charlotte Whitton
content: When one must, one can.

author: Sophocles
content: Who seeks shall find.

author: Albert Camus
content: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.

author: Oliver Herford
content: Many are called but few get up.

author: Woody Hayes
content: Success is the only motivational factor that a boy with character needs.

author: Rose Kennedy
content: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.

author: Eliza Dushku
content: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?

author: Beverly Sills
content: I've always tried to go a step past wherever people expected me to end up.

author: Jim Carrey
content: If you've got a talent, protect it.

author: J. D. Salinger
content: How do you know you're going to do something, untill you do it?

author: Ezra Pound
content: Either move or be moved.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Hitch your wagon to a star.

author: Leo Durocher
content: I come to win.

author: Daniel Webster
content: There is always room at the top.

author: Thomas Fuller
content: One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low.

author: Virgil
content: They can conquer who believe they can.

author: Edgar Cayce
content: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
content: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.

author: Cicely Tyson
content: You never know what motivates you.

author: Young Jeezy
content: I'm a motivational speaker.
